data.id: Code for Philly/(Un)Incarcerated - A Multimedia Documentary Project on Incarceration and Reentry

links.self: /organizations/Code for Philly/projects/(Un)Incarcerated - A Multimedia Documentary Project on Incarceration and Reentry.json

attributes.description: We're working with [The Reentry Project](https://thereentryproject.org/) to create an online, multimedia experience that will challenge people's perception of what someone with a criminal record looks like. This is currently planned through three pieces:
attributes.name: (Un)Incarcerated - A Multimedia Documentary Project on Incarceration and Reentry
